ref: 1983 *uddarati ʻ tears up ʼ. 2. *uddīryatē ʻ is split ʼ. 3. *uddr̥ta -- . 4. *uddārayati ~ uddālayati. [uddīrṇa -- Daś. &rcirclemacr 1. Si. uduranavā ʻ to tear out, pluck up ʼ whence intr. idirenavā ʻ to be eradicated ʼ.
Pa. udrīyati, uddī˚ ʻ is split open ʼ;
A. udiyāiba ʻ to uncover, expose to view ʼ.
